Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: I discovered that my imagination came alive when I moved away from the immediate world around me

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look at my last songs and first short stories, there is a real connection between them

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: I like novelists who can create other interesting worlds

Quote.Author: Kazuo Ishiguro
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent ages figuring out things like viewpoint, how you tell the story, and so on

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Progressive economic policies lead to a sustainable economy

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to knock doors, make calls, and build a relationship with voters long before Election Day

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Serving my neighbors in Congress and fighting for them has been the best job I've ever had

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Not voting is not a protest. It is a surrender

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: We need more leaders speaking up for minority groups who have been marginalized and attacked

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Pragmatism is not always a good thing. Experience is not always a good thing

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an energetic person. I work hard

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans used to be able to depend on their jobs to provide a stable retirement

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: We're Americans - in times of crisis, we step up

Quote.Author: Keith Ellison
Quote.QuoteValue: People spend money on negative campaigning because it works

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I never try to be too sexy. People know when you're not comfortable and trying to be sexy

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I work out. I'm getting toned, too. The Wii Fit really works your body. When I get off, I'm dying

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to stop separating ourselves by how dark or how light we are

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Not being happy really is my fear

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Staying stagnant is not okay

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't curl my hair. In fact, I don't know how to

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Singing was my first passion. Whenever I sing, I'm always so happy

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love singing and I love performing and just making things perfect

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being in the studio. Expressing myself that way is really cool

Quote.Author: Keke Palmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can dance. I like hip hop and stuff and jazz movements, but I'm horrible in ballet. I tried

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love life way too much and find fun in almost anything. I'm a chameleon

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no real tattoos. I wear my bruises and tons of scars as my tattoos

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really into extreme sports and just having fun

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to read. I have a Kindle, and it's nice to be able to download books that people refer

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the idea of marriage. I definitely want marriage and little Kellans running around

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: Actors strive to be part of something like 'Twilight' and what 'Twilight' is, is unbelievable

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I could definitely take someone out with my bare hands

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I probably have more friends from 'Twilight' than I've ever had in my whole life

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love someone who tries to boss me around

Quote.Author: Kellan Lutz
Quote.QuoteValue: I did Hilary Duff's 'With Love' music video-slash-fragrance ad

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never said I was a 'good girl.' I'm not a bad girl

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone says I'm like the girl next door... Y'all must have really weird neighbors!

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a hygiene freak. I'm like obsessive-compulsive when it comes to washing your hands

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: My winning is getting to perform. That's my victory

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: Who are you wearing? Who are you wearing?

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter what size I am I love performing no matter how big or little I am! I feel good

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been more nervous in my life than singing the national anthem at the Super Bowl

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just had my 30th birthday and we went turkey shooting. It's what I wanted to do, so we went

Quote.Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I'm a pop singer, I really have more the life of a country singer

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a prettier everywoman. I am an everywoman that they clean up awfully well for T.V

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like my mind is a little quieter when I exercise

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: Please get on an airplane or a horse, because it's pretty spectacular

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a picture-perfect childhood

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll quit tanning when the satchel handle grows out of my back

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: If I feel any sort of emotional upheaval, I go for a jog and I feel better

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's cheesecake in the house, I'll have some

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather not have a moment when I'm known for my looks; being funny and interesting lasts longer

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as an uber-mom

Quote.Author: Kelly Ripa
Quote.QuoteValue: I get paid to make out with the hunks!

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: I love history... everything is inspired by history, so that's why I love vintage and antiques

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: The single most important key to success is to be a good listener

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at every piece of furniture and every object as an individual sculpture

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: Having an eye is one thing, but you have to be able to execute

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just a curious gal who is continuing to be curious

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: The mixture of weird textures and organic surfaces creates an interesting dialogue

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a designer, which includes interiors, architecture, fashion, furniture, and lifestyle

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the bake-sale-mom type - though once in a while, I'll make challah French toast for my sons

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: Informed clients are better clients, and they make for better design

Quote.Author: Kelly Wearstler
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a voice, and there is a DNA to how I design

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Women in my focus groups, they say a bald man is trustworthy. He has nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Voters deserve - and they indeed expect - a good debate on the issues

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: I never knew how ugly and how stupid I was until, you know, we had Twitter

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to do right, apart from my gender - I want to do right as a campaign manager

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump is at his very best, at his very best, when he talks about the issues

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that people have realized it's very unwise to bet against Donald Trump

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell people all the time, 'Don't be fooled, because I am a man by day.'

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Most women say 'Please speak to me from the waist up: my brain, my eyes.'

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Most political wives are accidental politicians

Quote.Author: Kellyanne Conway
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing creates a winner quite like earning it, not just inheriting it

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: There's value in being a normal person

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so weird and quirky, and painfully awkward sometimes

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: Music videos, to me, are like an extension of a song

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a songwriter is really the base of being an artist, for me

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I really knew country music, I listened to pop, and I still do

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't be an artist if I didn't have Shania Twain, Faith Hill, Taylor Swift to look up to

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I would love to do a duet with Gavin Degraw. Or Ed Sheeran

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I listen to everything. I sing country music, but I listen to different stuff

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I starting writing when I was about 13 or 14 years old

Quote.Author: Kelsea Ballerini
Quote.QuoteValue: I love pop music. I've tried to always be honest about that

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to make me speechless

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go hunting with kings and princes

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: There's some bells you can't unring

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind fighting as long as it's for a good cause

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get to sue just because I don't like something

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Senator Cruz has done well in Republican states

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: Every liberal position is built on a fallacy

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being home for dinner

Quote.Author: Ken Cuccinelli
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't play golf with presidents

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: A very good editor is almost a collaborator

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to tell a story that makes the reader always want to see what will happen next

Quote.Author: Ken Follett

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a real connection between Philosopy and fiction

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: Culture clash is terrific drama

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: I started writing stories in my spare time

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: Be a perfectionist

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy learning technical details

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: Most of my stories have some basis in fact

Quote.Author: Ken Follett
Quote.QuoteValue: Movies have influenced all writers, not just thriller writers

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: It was my wife that insisted I do 'The Hangover.'

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: You just can't take the doctor out of you

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't sued out of medicine, I wasn't arbitrated out of the profession

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: Sitcom food is by far the tastiest of all showbiz food

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I went to Duke, which is... a Top Five school. Not community college. But whatever

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very simple approach in career: You work with the people you love

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very blessed that I have such a supportive wife who is secure with letting me embarrass myself

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not lying, every single project I've done, they've all been great

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in North Carolina, and I grew up on wrestling

Quote.Author: Ken Jeong
Quote.QuoteValue: I always just loved to laugh. I always just loved it as a kid

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: Fascism wants Baptism coast to coast

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: Allen Ginsberg is a tremendous warrior as time goes by. He's a warrior first and a poet second

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about taking a plow and breaking new ground. It gives you energy

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: To hell with facts! We need stories!

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised a Christian and was a stone-faced acid head

Quote.Author: Ken Kesey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been to too many Dead concerts. There've been smokin' holes where my memory used to be

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Polling in a general election is pretty accurate, because turnout is usually high

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody who enjoys being in the House of Commons probably needs psychiatric help

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: World wide capitalism kills more people everyday then Hitler did. And he was crazy

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Psephology isn't a hate crime

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: There isn't much about my life that's been particularly conventional

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm sifting the compost seed or pruning, I argue over issues in my head; I talk to myself

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Most kids don't get to go their parents' wedding

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: The civil service are risk averse

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: My political beliefs are my moral, quasi-religious framework

Quote.Author: Ken Livingstone
Quote.QuoteValue: I do the gardening

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: In college, before video games, we would amuse ourselves by posing programming exercises

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, we started off with two or three different shells and the shell had life of its own

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: When in doubt, use brute force

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: A well installed microcode bug will be almost impossible to detect

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I also have an idea for a book on biodiversity, and why and how we should be conserving it

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to have virtual memory, at least as it's coupled with file systems

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to separate data from programs, because data and instructions are very different

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: It is only the inadequacy of the criminal code that saves the hackers from very serious prosecution

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: No amount of source-level verification or scrutiny will protect you from using untrusted code

Quote.Author: Ken Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: On the one hand, the press, television, and movies make heroes of vandals by calling them whiz kids

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideal prom date would have to be cute, funny, sweet, nice

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: When it rains, I have good energy; I'm in a good mood

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to continue modeling and do the best that I can with that

Quote.QuoteValue: My dream jobs would be Italian 'Vogue' and anything with Chanel!

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I really don't have a celebrity crush

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work with a trainer. I just go to cheerleading practice and run a couple times a week

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: In first grade, I told my friends I had a third story in my house filled with jewels and lions

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: My name is Kendall. Kendall Jenner. I am not a Kardashian

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: Modeling is my number one priority - one hundred percent

Quote.Author: Kendall Jenner
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents taught me that work ethic is one of the most important keys in life, and I believe it

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: The best date would have to be at a sporting event - it will show the guy what type of girl she is

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in spirits, not ghosts

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can entertain. I am a party girl. I am a free spirit

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get more glamorous than you are on 'Dancing with the Stars.'

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never, ever see myself as a celebrity or famous, so I poke fun at that

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I live my life on TV - it's like a home video

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no shame

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything negative, I have to let go because it's too toxic for me

Quote.Author: Kendra Wilkinson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being a comfortable person, but I'm very open. I'm not ashamed of myself and my beliefs

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't find myself so exercised by a desperation to be new

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: I fondly remember good times working on 'Thor.'

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: Being Irish, I always had this love of words

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: I think we love the escapism of something like 'Cinderella,' and I think we do with 'Thor.'

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: I've lived a lot of my life in London, so I often feel that I am a Londoner

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: The elasticity of Shakespeare is extraordinary

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: My definition of success is control

Quote.Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very strange that the people you love are often the people you're most cruel to

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: The stock market is a discounter of all known information

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Having different types of stocks in your portfolio can enhance returns

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: China's stock market is inextricably tied to politics

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is filled with successful small businesses that stay small

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: In a bubble, anyone who argues pessimistically is seen as crazy

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Readers regularly ask what can go wrong but almost never what could positively surprise

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Over rolling long periods, U.S. and non-U.S. stocks tend to equalize

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite its many critics, hydraulic fracturing will change the nature of energy production

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done well over time but made lots of mistakes, too. Learn from your mistakes

Quote.Author: Kenneth Fisher
Quote.QuoteValue: A constant in my approach to investing: You should think politically but unconventionally

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest single challenge to America and our future is income inequality. We've got to fix it

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: A million dollars in the presidential election is a spit in the ocean. It's not a lot of money

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned playing poker that you never count your winnings because that's when you start to lose

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: You only have to worry about going to jail if you break the law. That's pretty simple

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: Dick Grasso would be a superb mayor of the City of New York. He loves the city

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm nuts, I'm rich, and boy, do I love a fight!

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: Rich people in one country don't act the same as rich people in another country

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: America has thrived on capitalism, and America will thrive again on capitalism

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: We had 90 percent taxes before in America. All right? Didn't work

Quote.Author: Kenneth Langone
Quote.QuoteValue: People can't live on $7.50 an hour

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: Our liquidity is fine. As a matter of fact, it's better than fine. It's strong

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: In the case of Enron, we balance our positions all the time

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: There are absolutely no problems that had anything to do with Jeff's departure

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: Jeff knew full well what he was walking away from. Again, he needed to deal with this right away

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: Am I a fool? I don't think I'm a fool. But I think I sure was fooled

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: We use competitive markets to arrange for delivery of our food supply

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: You'll have lower prices under deregulation than you will through regulation

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: We see ourselves as first helping to open up markets to competition

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: They can't do without electricity. They can do with less electricity

Quote.Author: Kenneth Lay
Quote.QuoteValue: But I can't take responsibility for criminal conduct of somebody inside the company

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there is a part of life that I'm missing

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: My mind is constantly going. For me to completely relax, I gotta get rid of my cell phone

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a shark. I've got to be constantly moving

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll admit I'm a workaholic

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: The last couple of years I've been on an empty tank. And that's gotta change

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I have 120 employees on the road every day, and about 30 other employees off the road

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess what I'm trying to say is, I'm a helluva kisser

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I ever feel sexy. I don't think that's for me to decide, if I'm sexy or not

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: First and foremost, I consider myself a songwriter

Quote.Author: Kenny Chesney
Quote.QuoteValue: I want there to be a level of respect between everybody

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that you simply can't control those bad vibes

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: The Moment is an album that contains the best music I have ever produced

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: I really create everything I do from the heart

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because people play songs with great technique doesn't mean the records are better

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: If I even lose my glasses or make a mistake. I become really disappointed in myself

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a few countries that, for whatever reason, really enjoy listening to my music

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: It wasn't until Duotones that I felt my true voice come out

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: Finally, I was no longer a student and was making music for myself

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole rise of new adult contemporary music and smooth jazz was a nice surprise

Quote.Author: Kenny G
Quote.QuoteValue: That's my ideal day, time with my boys

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em, know when to walk away, know when to run

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: People will clap to be nice. They will not laugh to be nice

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't be afraid to give up the good for the great

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always said music should make you laugh, make you cry or make you think

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised in the church

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing older is not upsetting; being perceived as old is

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: Know when to hold 'um, know when to fold 'um and know when to walk away from cameramen

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a trade off - as you grow older you gain wisdom but you lose spontaneity

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I had holes in my jeans well before it was fashionable

Quote.Author: Kenny Rogers
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always said that gray hair looks good on everybody but yourself. To me, it makes me look old

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom is a constant in my life in so many ways

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, Michael Jordan was my Olympic hero

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: In my heart, I'm so far from done

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one way to prepare for playing beach volleyball, and that's by getting in the sand

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: No one behind you gets the appreciation they deserve

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to win a gold medal in London

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: The advice I will give my children, if and when they have Olympic aspirations, will be to go for it

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to sleep, eat, breathe volleyball. Now I have that with my kids

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally, I'll have three training sessions a day

Quote.Author: Kerri Walsh Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: We're a pretty open-book family; we kind of lead with our hearts. There's nothing to hide

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a new perspective where I got a role in and they are just spewed out of my mouth

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: My first figure was a SLAYER eagle. And the dragons and the tribals are all I have got

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: When something irritates me, I don't go home and write; I just don't do that

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the church and the religion right now have a lot more to be worried about than SLAYER

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: In the crazy world of touring, if something gets stuck at customs, I can do a show with just my amp!

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I have tons of friends in the heavy-metal music world, and just going to see them inspires me
